response.overview: P. seems to be a child just like any other. But one day, coming back from school, he finds post-it stickers stuck around the house. Is it an exception, or is it part of its everyday life to find messages scattered around the house? Who writes them? Post it is a journey into the small world of a child. A world made of colorful fish that dart into communal pools, of continuous chases towards something that escapes and of loneliness.
response.title: Post-it
